result.eng: You will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ga: beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.orig: beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.html: beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ cead agat an scrúdú a ḋéanaṁ an aṫuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.

result.eng: A pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ga: níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.orig: níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.html: níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ponchtml: níl cead pinn luaiḋe a úsáid aċ aṁáin ċun nótaí a ṫógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
